title: Getting sick of this Riot.
body: I have posted a discussion on the Rads error and nobody has bothered to reply or help so i thought "hey lets send in a support ticket" but guess what Riot. Your support page doesn't work either.

replies.body: dear lord can someone from riot get back to us on this.. i have not been able to play for more than a week and we cannot submit tickets, we cannot re download, we also cannot use most of the support features or links being sent... it has been like this for about a week or more for me... we cannot submit tickets you guys literally need to talk to us here...
im truly glad im not the only one with this problem, but its pretty stressful. Whats everyone's internet provider? maybe that has something to do with it. mine is TPG

What site are you using to reach support? This is the current link for ticket submission: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you're using the right link then what issue in particular are you having with the site?

Hey buddy i can help with that. Im having the same issue, i can not connect to your game, your "download game" link, OR your ticket link. Its something to do with not being able to connect with the maestro.. or something?
It says its a firewall/antivirus/not connected to internet issue, thats not right though. Iv turned off firewall and antivirus, still just brought me to the unable to connect page. I have 12.6 mbps internet and every other web page loads perfectly. I think its something to do with a DNS port being closed to rito or something to do with the new patch. I have no idea how to fix it though, iv had the same problem for 3 days (since new patch came out).
Usually it says something more to do with an encryption file but this is what it showed this time. Im sure this guy is having the exact same problem.

Thanks for clarifying, makes a lot more sense and it seems like a DNS issue. Either your PC, router, or ISP's DNS server is caching old records for longer than usually acceptable and this makes it impossible for you to connect to any of our domain names.

There are solutions for each, but the easiest is to configure your PC or router to use Google DNS. Instructions [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4).

Otherwise, if you know how, you can lower the TTL of the DNS records on your router or run a /flushdns on your PC, but these will only work if either of them is the source of the issue respectively.
Btw heres that other SS. Also if you didnt see my other message, that link didnt work, same message as the previous screenshot i sent, said something about dns.
is this not going to be fixed anytime soon? iv not played league in like 2 weeks now, iv spent probably over 400$ over 3-4 years and id really like to play it

The link left in your comment is on the support page meaning the link you have left to help us is inaccessible for the above mentioned reasons. i normally only have to play hearthstone during waiting timers but u guys are making me play it as a first priority game sheesh what has this world come to
yeah that link doesnt work. Also i have tried opening all the league ports (portforwarding) and flushing DNS, did not work.

>DNS

A lot of people have found out that no matter what DNS they use they get the exact same problem. I'm not one of this, but you should know that changing DNS is not the end-all solution.
